name: Islay Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR whisky with three ice cubes (dry to the touch frozen ice, not wet ice) in a glass
Add sugar syrup, bitters and two more ice cubes
STIR some more and add another two ice cubes
STIR a bit more, and if you have room, add more ice
